mapper.insert: insert into members(mid , password , name , email , phone , zipcode, address1 , address2 , gender , birth , mpoint , createdate ) VALUES (#{mid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{mpoint}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from checkes where module = #{module} and field = #{field} and kind = #{kind} order by mykey asc
select mid , password , name , email , phone , zipcode, address1 , address2 , gender , birth , mpoint , createdate from members
select count(*) as cnt from members
mapper.insert: insert into shoppinginfo(mid, productcode, productname, qty, price, pimg , discount) values(#{mid}, #{productcode}, #{productname}, #{qty}, #{price}, #{pimg}, #{discount})
